vernac_cmds: Lemma perp_bisect_equiv_def : forall P Q A B, Perp_bisect P Q A B <-> Perp_bisect_bis P Q A B.
intros; unfold Perp_bisect; unfold Perp_bisect_bis; unfold ReflectL; split.
intro H; destruct H as [[[X [HMid HCol]] HPerp] HDiff].
elim HPerp; clear HPerp; intro HPerp; intuition.
intro H; destruct H as [I [HPerp HMid]].
split; try (left; apply l8_14_2_1a with I); Perp.
Lemma perp_bisect_sym_1 : forall P Q A B, Perp_bisect P Q A B -> Perp_bisect Q P A B.
Lemma perp_bisect_sym_2 : forall P Q A B, Perp_bisect P Q A B -> Perp_bisect P Q B A.
Lemma perp_bisect_sym_3 : forall A B C D, Perp_bisect A B C D -> Perp_bisect B A D C.
Lemma perp_bisect_perp : forall P Q A B, Perp_bisect P Q A B -> Perp P Q A B.
Lemma perp_bisect_cong_1 : forall P Q A B, Perp_bisect P Q A B -> Cong A P B P.
apply (per_double_cong P I A B); eauto with perp.
Lemma perp_bisect_cong_2 : forall P Q A B, Perp_bisect P Q A B -> Cong A Q B Q.
apply (per_double_cong Q I A B); eauto with perp.
Lemma perp_bisect_cong2 : forall P Q A B, Perp_bisect P Q A B -> Cong A P B P /\ Cong A Q B Q.
Lemma perp_bisect_cong : forall A A1 B B1 C C1 O: Tpoint, ~ Col A B C -> Perp_bisect O A1 B C -> Perp_bisect O B1 A C -> Perp_bisect O C1 A B -> Cong A O B O -> Cong B O C O -> Cong A O C O.
apply (cong_transitivity A O B O C O); assumption.
Lemma cong_cop_perp_bisect : forall P Q A B, P <> Q -> A <> B -> Coplanar P Q A B -> Cong A P B P -> Cong A Q B Q -> Perp_bisect P Q A B.
assert (Per P I A) by (unfold Per;exists B;eCong).
apply coplanar_perm_12, col_cop__cop with B; Col; Cop.
Lemma perp_bisect_is_on_perp_bisect : forall A B C P, Is_on_perp_bisect P A B -> Is_on_perp_bisect P B C -> Is_on_perp_bisect P A C.
Lemma perp_mid_perp_bisect : forall A B C D, Midpoint C A B -> Perp C D A B -> Perp_bisect C D A B.
Lemma cong_cop2_perp_bisect_col : forall A B C D E, Coplanar A C D E -> Coplanar B C D E -> Cong C D C E -> Perp_bisect A B D E -> Col A B C.
intros A B C D E HCop1 HCop2 HCong1 HPerp.
assert (HCong2 := HPerp); apply perp_bisect_cong2 in HCong2; destruct HCong2 as [HCong2 Hc]; clear Hc.
assert (HCol := HPerp); apply perp_in_col in HCol; destruct HCol as [HCol Hc]; clear Hc.
elim (eq_dec_points A C); intro; try (subst; Col).
apply cop_perp2__col with D E; Perp; Cop.
Lemma perp_bisect_cop2_existence : forall A B C, A <> B -> exists P, exists Q, Perp_bisect P Q A B /\ Coplanar A B C P /\ Coplanar A B C Q.
destruct (ex_perp_cop A B M C HDiff) as [Q []].
exists M; exists Q; unfold Perp_bisect.
Lemma perp_bisect_existence : forall A B, A <> B -> exists P, exists Q, Perp_bisect P Q A B.
destruct (perp_bisect_cop2_existence A B A HDiff) as [P [Q []]].
Lemma perp_bisect_existence_cop : forall A B C, A <> B -> exists P, exists Q, Perp_bisect P Q A B /\ Coplanar A B C P /\ Coplanar A B C Q.
destruct (ex_perp_cop A B M C) as [Q [HQ HCop]]; auto.
exists M; exists Q; unfold Perp_bisect.
assert (Coplanar A B Q M) by Cop.
Lemma cong_perp_bisect : forall P Q A B, P <> Q -> A <> B -> Cong A P B P -> Cong A Q B Q -> Perp_bisect P Q A B.
intros P Q A B HPQ HAB.
assert (HCop := all_coplanar P Q A B).
Lemma cong_perp_bisect_col : forall A B C D E, Cong C D C E -> Perp_bisect A B D E -> Col A B C.
intros A B C D E.

command: intros; unfold Perp_bisect; unfold Perp_bisect_bis; unfold ReflectL; split.
intro H; destruct H as [[[X [HMid HCol]] HPerp] HDiff].
elim HPerp; clear HPerp; intro HPerp; intuition.
intro H; destruct H as [I [HPerp HMid]].
split; try (left; apply l8_14_2_1a with I); Perp.
apply (per_double_cong P I A B); eauto with perp.
apply (per_double_cong Q I A B); eauto with perp.
apply (cong_transitivity A O B O C O); assumption.
assert (Per P I A) by (unfold Per;exists B;eCong).
apply coplanar_perm_12, col_cop__cop with B; Col; Cop.
intros A B C D E HCop1 HCop2 HCong1 HPerp.
assert (HCong2 := HPerp); apply perp_bisect_cong2 in HCong2; destruct HCong2 as [HCong2 Hc]; clear Hc.
assert (HCol := HPerp); apply perp_in_col in HCol; destruct HCol as [HCol Hc]; clear Hc.
elim (eq_dec_points A C); intro; try (subst; Col).
apply cop_perp2__col with D E; Perp; Cop.
destruct (ex_perp_cop A B M C HDiff) as [Q []].
exists M; exists Q; unfold Perp_bisect.
destruct (perp_bisect_cop2_existence A B A HDiff) as [P [Q []]].
destruct (ex_perp_cop A B M C) as [Q [HQ HCop]]; auto.
exists M; exists Q; unfold Perp_bisect.
assert (Coplanar A B Q M) by Cop.
intros P Q A B HPQ HAB.
assert (HCop := all_coplanar P Q A B).
intros A B C D E.
